participant_1.background:
I usually wake up early, eat a quick breakfast, and review my classes before heading out the door.
I loved playing outside with my friends and riding my bike.
I love the feeling of creating something beautiful, and I find that jewelry design is a great way to express my creativity.
i love to read books.
I like to dye my hair a variety of colors, but my favorite is a dark shade of teal.

participant_2.background:

I have never been arrested, but my stories might make you think otherwise.
I like to enjoy some comfort food like spaghetti and meatballs when I'm not counting calories.
i am a grown woman.
I try to keep in touch with my family, but I can be busy with school and my job.

content.text: Pretty good, just got back from a bike ride.
Nice! I love to bike. I went scuba diving with my wife and friends to celebrate my birthday. Have you ever been scuba diving?
I have not! That sounds like a lot of fun.
It is really fun. I recommend it if you ever get the chance.
I will definitely check it out. What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook. I love to enjoy some comfort food like spaghetti and meatballs when I'm not counting calories.
I love to cook too! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to cook pasta dishes. My favorite is a dish that my mom used to make when I was younger. It's spaghetti with meatballs and a homemade sauce.
That sounds delicious. I'm going to have to try that sometime.
You should! It's really easy to make.
No problem! How about you? What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read books. I love the feeling of creating something beautiful, and I find that jewelry design is a great way to express my creativity
